sentence.Network_en: My dad whistled tunelessly through his teeth.
sentence.Network_cn: 我爸爸从牙缝里不成调地乱吹口哨。

sentence.Network_en: He had an irritating habit of singing tunelessly about the house.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有个恼人的习惯,老在屋子里不成调地唱歌.

sentence.Network_en: Three shaggy-haired men thrash tunelessly at their guitars.
sentence.Network_cn: 3个头发蓬乱的男人没腔没调地乱弹着吉他。

entry.tran: 不悦耳的;不成调的;难听的
entry.def: Tuneless music and voices do not sound pleasant.

example.ex: Someone walked by, singing a tuneless song.
example.tran: 有人走过，唱着一首不成调的歌。
